Thelgar BOT 21-11-2023 02:29
Throughout the Director's monologue Thelgar has been seething, just waiting for his chance to show these 'Machine People' exactly what he thinks of their experiments and their shiny rocks. The fact that Whizzerd is speaking in a voice not his own will just have to wait, as will the Director's insinuation that their leader is under some kind of demonic possession. No, right now there's violence to done. With a roar, Thelgar slams his maul into the chittering skittering crystalline porcupine beast, knocking it off balance and unprepared for the tempestuous onslaught that follows: ice and lightning and thunder explode out of in dwarf in a ferocious upward spiral, slaying the beast outright. Through the maelstrom comes Thelgar charging forward, screaming like an idiot with maul raised high. Thunderous BOOMs follow his footsteps and violently blast everything and everyone in his wake. With superhuman speed he rushes forward to square off against the hideously transformed Doctor Puckett. "C'mon, darlin! Let's dance!" ah yes, beautiful, yes... That was how the scene was playing out in Thelgar's head... but the reality turns out to be somewhat different. As soon as 'Helen' turns her disfigured gaze upon him Thelgar suddenly feels weak. Slow. POWERLESS. He realizes in a flash that his magical abilities are gone! "Guys... guys! She's doin somethin! My magic, I can't- it's gone!!!" (edited)

DM [Esh] BOT 21-11-2023 03:59

Magically drained, Whizzerd succumbs to the blows and is now held in Helen's grip as she stares deep into Whizzerd's eyes, razor teeth salivating but whizzerd can swear he can see tears running down her grotesque cheek. The defenders on the other hand carefully follow their charge, bracing themselves for any incoming blows.

Ellie Lightfall BOT 21-11-2023 21:44
As the gem‚Äôs light reaches her, a feeling of emptiness stirs deep within her, as if all at once, the soul shard inside her, the very one that helped fuel her connection to the Weave and to the stars, was silenced. It was like feeling your stomach drop when you witnessed death for the first time, except it was more gradual, and throughout your whole being. Of course, her gear was affected too. The magical shimmer of her cloak, the ever present sheen on her shield. The runes on her dragon sword and even her shimmerleaf amulet, all faded into mundanity. But she moved forward, letting her legs guide her, and when she found herself out of the gem‚Äôs influence, she breathed, feeling whole again. ‚ÄúMagic or no magic, I made an oath. From the stars in the sky to the dust beneath our feet. From the day we begin, to the day we end, we are held together for an instant, that we might know another. My oath is to the stardust, to the people that exist between.‚Äù A spectral dragon‚Äôs maw formed over Ellie‚Äôs head like a helmet, and she exhaled a breath of shimmering purple force, a visible shockwave that slammed into Whizzerd‚Äôs aggressors. The maw faded and she continued to engage one of the crystal-quilled creatures with her re-illuminated sword, fatally wounding it with twin strikes of metal and light. Thelgar BOT 21-11-2023 22:23
Thelgar is heartened at seeing Ellie's renewed vigor, and the pieces finally click into place. The gems - it's gotta be tha gems! He sidesteps - warily at first, trying not to draw 'Helen's attention or gaze. Then, in a rush, he feels his power return to him, and he grins wickedly. "Oh ya shouldn'a done that, gorgeous." With enhanced speed he rushes forward, coming up on the enemy's blind spot as he prepares the most destructive spell in his arsenal... # BOOM! A forty-foot sphere of thunderous destruction detonates right above the guardian drones, rattling the lab equipment in its racks and shaking dust down from the rafters. It is quickly punctuated by a blast of gale-force wind streaked with lightning that pummels Helen to the ground and shatters the carapace of one guardian. Thelgar BOT 22-11-2023 12:36

Thelgar BOT 22-11-2023 16:37

Edit a proxied message you sent Usage: tul!edit _[message] _ - Edit a message. Reply to a message to edit that specific message, otherwise the most recent proxy is edited. You can also specify a message via message ID or message link. You can also use this command by reacting to a proxy you sent with or by using it in DMs with a message link.

DM [Esh] BOT 22-11-2023 17:37
But whether the doctor would make good on his promise about his friends whizzerd genuinely could not discern. He does remember that the director tended to focus on the bigger picture. If he had Dr. Lars- Whizzerd back in his fold maybe the companions' life really made no difference to him.

DM [Esh] BOT 23-11-2023 02:44

Excited and quite proud of herself, Cassie shoots up to tell the others but an unnoticed gemstone set at the top of the doorway gives a light glow, which washes over the rogue similar to how the entry door to this lab had done. As the wave washes over Cassie she hears a disembodied tinny voice overhead; Unidentified entity detected. Preparing defensive protocols. The walls around the room start to shake. Other robotic forms start to animate to prepare to deal with the new threat.
DM [Esh] BOT 23-11-2023 02:45

DM [Esh] BOT 23-11-2023 11:34
With the room now secure Cassie continues with her exploration of the room. Most of it, like most of the facility has been so far, has been nothing except great machines of nothing important (to her) and scientific doodads. Taking careful note of which sections moved during the 'defensive protocol', Cassie hastily picked up her pace. Last thing she wanted to do was to turn them back on again. She passed some more tables. These had several containers with various body parts of various races and of even of various entities. Some possessing the entire body of tiny creatures, not of this world. Many of the jars also had various types, shapes and even colors of the crystals all around them, seemingly to test and determine different reactions and other such trials. Passing through these, Cassie whips back around to the north wall and sees things more palatable to her. Normal boring papers on a work desk. Skimming through them she sees more of the jumbled lingo but notices a signature that she's seen before but this time the initials stand out as something she's recently heard.
DM [Esh] BOT 23-11-2023 11:34
Picking up one such paper she starts to read;
**Doctor&#x27;s Log - Week 74** It is with a profound sense of affirmation that I record the results of our collaboration with Doctor Matthias Larson, an addition to the Machine People collective. Doctor Larson's inclusion has proven to be nothing short of transformative, as his unique abilities and skills have ushered in a new era of advancement within our ranks. With a remarkable talent for understanding and connecting with the local populace, Dr. Larson's influence has been pivotal in facilitating our research. His proficiency in establishing a rapport with the community has granted us unparalleled access to resources and, more importantly, to individuals willing to contribute to our scientific endeavors. The significance of his contributions cannot be overstated, and the synergy between his abilities and our scientific expertise has brought about tremendous progress in our mission. The decision to invite Doctor Larson into our fold is one that we wholeheartedly commend, as it has undoubtedly propelled us toward our shared objective of unearthing the arcane secrets hidden within ancient technology. *Dr. GR*
Cassie BOT 23-11-2023 11:36

DM [Esh] BOT 23-11-2023 17:23

DM [Esh] BOT 28-11-2023 03:45

Whizzerd BOT 28-11-2023 04:59

DM [Esh] BOT 28-11-2023 05:43
Whizzerd picks up the document and reads
**Doctor&#x27;s Log - Week 55** In our relentless exploration of the crystalline containment mechanisms, a revelation of profound consequence has unfolded, unraveling new avenues in our quest for understanding. It has come to our attention that specific crystal shards, attuned to particular emotions, hold the potential to act as conduits for the opening of portals to distinct planes of existence. This discovery suggests a deep-seated connection between human emotions and the fabric of alternate realities, a concept that beckons further investigation. Initial experiments have provided compelling evidence that certain emotions are intricately tied to correlated planes of existence. For instance, emotions of profound serenity and inner peace appear to be associated with portals leading to tranquil and ethereal dimensions, marked by harmony and serenity. Conversely, emotions steeped in turmoil or distress evoke rifts to planes that mirror the turmoil of the mind, mirroring the chaos and upheaval experienced. This revelation signifies an astounding opportunity to delve into the intricate relationship between human emotions and the cosmos itself. The crystalline containment mechanisms, initially conceived to harness the malevolent forces set on our destruction, may serve as the key to unlocking the doorways to parallel dimensions, each shaped and influenced by the emotional frequencies of our emotional experience. As we continue to explore this profound connection, the Machine People are poised at the precipice of new horizons in our relentless pursuit of knowledge and advancemens. The realization that the emotions we harbor may serve as gateways to otherworldly realms unveils a captivating journey, one that calls for a tempered approach and a heightened sense of scientific responsibility in our ongoing endeavors. *Dr. GR*
Ellie Lightfall BOT 28-11-2023 05:54
‚ÄúParallel worlds‚Ä¶‚Äù She leaned over Whizzerd to quietly read the note along with him and presumably the others. When she leaned away she looked at her amulet, feeling for the first time a confused sort of familiarity. ‚ÄúWhat kind of emotions do you think are in these ones?‚Äù Ellie moves over to try and examine the crystals for some mark of magic or perhaps the emotions potentially housed within their depths.
DM [Esh] BOT 28-11-2023 06:08
Ellie grabs hold into one of the crystals and her mind fades; In the quiet of a sun-dappled meadow, you found yourself seated upon a weathered blanket, surrounded by the gentle rustle of leaves and the distant murmur of a babbling brook. The world around you seems to breathe in harmony, each blade of grass swaying in orchestrated unison. As you close your eyes, the ambient sounds‚Äîthe soft hum of insects, the rhythmic melody of the brook, and the occasional whisper of the wind through the leaves‚Äîformed a gentle lullaby, cradling you in a cocoon of serenity.

Your voice, usually steady, takes on an unfamiliar edge as frustration boils over. The acrid taste of adrenaline fills your mouth, and every word spoken, each gesture made, becomes more and more animated as you lose control over yourself and your actions. You can't take it any longer! You start seeing red, your trembling hands turn to fists! You violently slam them against the table before your vision quickly turns black!

DM [Esh] BOT 05-12-2023 13:05
The room through the portal is similar to the rest with a memory shard laying where you enter, touching the shard fills your mind: The air explodes with electric fervor, pulsating with the raw, untamed energy of unhinged revelry. All semblance of restraint shatters, and the primal chaos reverberates through you as you join in with the laughter around you, wild and infectious, intertwined with the erratic beats of music. Dancing shadows, cast by the frenzied glow of countless flames behind the mercurial dancers, twisting and contorting in a riotous hysteria of movement. A heavy fog hangs directly above as the sweet smell of substance permeates the air, further driving those around deeper into their carnal thoughts and bringing it to the surface. The night morphs into a canvas for unabashed spontaneity, a whirlwind of ecstatic abandon where the shackles of convention are torn away, and you surrender to the intoxication seeing all manner of debauchery all around you. In this frenetic bacchanalian spree, time disintegrates, and the boundaries of the expected dissolve into a pulsating kaleidoscope of unrestrained experiences.
Cassie BOT 05-12-2023 13:46
"Can I keep this one?" Cassie asks, a little breathless.
2
1
Thelgar BOT 05-12-2023 14:55
Back in the central hub, Thelgar rubs his temples as the group is reunited. Crystals and feelings and puzzles and riddles - it was all too much for this simple sailor-turned-stormspeaker. He ticks off on his fingers, trying to recall the various memories they've located, and which remain unmatched. "Let's see, we got angry talkin, smartypants invention, a ghost town, an - whatever the hell that just was," the last with a stern look at Cassie. "Well, plug it in an let's see if it opens up another one'a them trickery portals."
Cassie BOT 05-12-2023 14:59
Cassie seems reluctant to part with her newest shard, but the temptation to see what world it reveals is enough incentive to win her over. She places the bacchanalian bauble into the main archway...
DM [Esh] BOT 05-12-2023 16:30
Like the others, as the main archway comes into contact with a memory shard, the portal shifts; At first, the realm of this gateway seemed similar to the Material Realm but not identical; Instead, it is one of unrestrained and awe-inspiring natural beauty. Bathed in the twilight of the setting (or perhaps rising?) sun, sporadic lanterns and fireflies throughout the land providing additional, yet haunting lights. Any semblance of natural landscape was markedly more dramatic and beautiful, mountains standing straighter and sharper, rivers flowing clearer and faster. The colors of the land extremely vivid; flowers saturated in bright hues, the sky and sun blazing unnaturally so, but at the same time any shadows were darker, stretched further. Though the beauty of this realm is striking, you sense an unnatural nervousness, that things are too beautiful, too bright, and that at any moment, this entire land may manifest true chaos.
Cassie BOT 05-12-2023 17:48
"What do we think? Is this the opposite of the desolate streets?" she poses to the others.
Whizzerd BOT 05-12-2023 19:07
‚ÄúWhizzerd feels uneasy,‚Äù he comments at the streets around him, ‚ÄúBut Whizzerd thinks this works as the opposite. No harm in trying either way no?‚Äù
Cassie BOT 05-12-2023 19:15
"No harm so far," Cassie clarifies. "The next question is whether we're all going together to try this shard out on the other side, or do we not want to risk the entire party getting sucked into an alternate dimension?" Cassie asks, because hey it's just another day in Barovia.
Thelgar BOT 05-12-2023 19:29

Cassie BOT 06-12-2023 01:03
Cassie nods and takes a deep breath before stepping through the vision of the fey realm. Once everyone has joined her, she'll try putting the "desolate streets" shard into the archway.
DM [Esh] BOT 06-12-2023 01:07
Stepping through the gateway to the Feywild, (un)fortunately, Cassie finds herself in another lab room, yet another shard nearby.
DM [Esh] BOT 06-12-2023 01:09
Touching the crystal imbues her with another memory: In the embrace of a vivid memory, you find yourself transported to a sunlit afternoon by the beach. The air is thick with the tang of salt, and the cerulean sky stretches endlessly above, unblemished by even a wisp of cloud. The rhythmic melody of waves kissing the shore is a soothing rhythm that lulls you into a state of serene contentment. Laughter, joy and a sense of being fully carefree fills the air as friends and loved ones gather on the sandy expanse for a celebration as you see a section setup with tables, benches and a large selection of food. The children of relatives are running around, playing and laughing. The older guests are gathered in groups, catching up, enjoying each other's company. You stand with your toes in the sand, a smile upon your face and the warmth of the sun kissing your skin as time seems to slow, allowing you to bask in the glow of shared happiness of being with so many of your loved ones.
Thelgar BOT 06-12-2023 02:52
Thelgar nods his silent assent as Cassie checks before placing the "desolate streets" shard into the archway. His grip tightens around the shaft of his maul, waiting for whatever might come out...
Cassie BOT 06-12-2023 15:18
Cassie takes a deep breath and tries putting in the shard.
DM [Esh] BOT 06-12-2023 15:49
On the exhale Cassie connects the crystal of desolation to the archway of the Feywild... but.. nothing. The shard just clinks to the floor. Cassie bends to pick it up and as she rises, she senses an uneasiness emanate from the archway. An unaligment. A psychic backlash pulses out of each of the gates, reeling -but not harming- each of you
DM [Esh] BOT 06-12-2023 17:45
The psychic wave nearly knocks Cassie backwards, disorienting her for a short while. With the wave Thelgar gets another sense, the emotions of the shards, the destinations of the portals solidifying in his mind, becoming more whole and coherent. The man in the memory with escalated discussions fills Thelgar's being. Despite his attempt at control anger seems to well up within him! The power of the shards grab onto these emotions filling the gateway with a fitting realm- one of fire and brimstone! Thelgar's breath catches as his mind suddenly shifts emotions and thoughts. He is now in the workshop, yes, he feels triumphant and proud but the reason lay before him; his inventions fill the room. He is proud of producing. Of creating! How everything fits into place with a precise order and method! These emotions are exemplified by the beautiful mechanical realm it opened to, one of structure and purpose! Feeling like he's racing a million miles a minute Thelgar abruptly stops in front of the desolate town, he witnesses firsthand the affects of neglect and abandonment can do. His body still unconsciously puffed from the pride in production fully deflates from witnessing the forced decay and collapse. A void of emptiness. The chaos of no control and abandonment; the jagged, shattered windows, the wild creeping vines left unchecked!
DM [Esh] BOT 06-12-2023 17:45
Despite being in another room, Whizzerd is also susceptible to the psychic barrage. Though unexpected, he steels himself and he too experiences a cacophony of memories, becoming clearer in his mind's eye than ever before. Warped to the unbridled scene, Whizzerd feels himself letting go with wild abandoned! Like the Feywild, the memory that powered that gateway is filled with the joy reckless inhibition! Of fun! Of laughter! The musky scents of those surrounding you and the lack of caring of anything else! The flames of the festivals suddenly blink out leaving Whizzerd in absolute darkness but the darkness is only short-lived as a beautiful sunrise touches Whizzerd's skin. With the coming light Whizzerd hears peals of joyous laughter and the gathering of friends of loved ones. Seeing this, Whizzerd is stricken with a memory of his own family, Mira. A wave of sadness washes over him as the feelings of missing daughter tries to grab him but it cannot take hold. Seeing the happiness around him is infectious. The joy of being with his (or the person who's memory this is) fills him with a happiness that threatens to burst out of his heart. Where he previously felt unrestrained pleasure, it was from the external influences. It was wild and untamed but now the happiness felt truer.... more genuine. Coming from an inner sense of happiness.

As it touches the gate the portal shimmers a radiant light: Towering into the heavens, a colossal mountain rises up from an infinite sea of radiantly pure water. The sky of above radiance a calm hue which softly bathes everything in gentle shades of luminance. Higher up, pinnacle of the mountain is veiled in ethereal mists that shimmer with the brilliance of pure, unfiltered light. The mountain reaches for the infinite heavens, seven plateaus in total, each slopes are filled with different terrain, each level reflecting a different facet of perfection. The beauty before you is not just of physical grandeur but in the palpable presence of benevolent energies inspiring awe in those fortunate enough to witness it.
DM [Esh] BOT 07-12-2023 03:42

DM [Esh] BOT 08-12-2023 01:06
Bringing the shard of decay and abandonment to the archway opens another portal; As the gateway opens, a plane like none you've ever seen lays before you. A plane is a loose word. This terrain consists of a multitude of planes and layers, intermeshing and superimposed over each other. Nothing is coherent, nothing is ordered, nothing makes sense. Only roiling chaos. Different items from the material plane, such as trees, buildings and mountains are strewn throughout any solid surface that they can stick to. Elements from the each elemental plane swirland gather in formless masses and random landscapes ripped directly out from their respective plane, all swirling around in an empty void with no gravity, order or reason. A tumultuous place of pure chaos, everything you see is in constant motion and change, especially the landscape, which shifts unpredictably right before your very eyes, randomly rolling over upon itself like liquid.

Trigger warning [depression] ||In your somber moments of solitude, the world becomes a muted canvas, drained of vibrancy and drowned in the echoes of silent despair. You feel no pleasure, the only thing you feel is total numbness. There is no one, no one to spend company with, no one to share your burden with. Only total isolation. The walls of isolation, thick and impenetrable, confining your spirit to a bleak landscape where shadows of melancholy play upon the fragility of your mind. The ambient stillness, rather than offering solace, intensifies your inner turmoil. Even being surrounded by people, you feel the air hang heavy with crippling loneliness, and the world around you, once filled with vibrance, now seems distant and indifferent.||
DM [Esh] BOT 08-12-2023 05:42
The vision is filled with the emotions of one desiring for longing and loneliness. Despite being surrounded by people they have never felt more isolated before. There is no pleasure, only numbness. No party, no celebrations. Only the frigidness of isolation.

Buoyed up by gusts of elemental air he rises until he's at eye level with the remaining crystalline orb in the sky. "Didja think I'd let ya miss all the fun?!" he demands. (edited)
Ellie Lightfall BOT 15-12-2023 18:12
Absolutely fed up with these crystals, she strikes it again and again, failing to land a lethal blow. "Oh just die already!" Giving her a small amount of reprieve is the slight warming glow of her amulet.
Whizzerd BOT 15-12-2023 18:35
Just in the instance he was on the battle field Whizzerd finds himself back at Matthias‚Äô house, back in the Maw. A small farmhouse surrounded by rows of wheat. ‚ÄúWhizzerd‚Ä¶ I remember this place,* ‚Äúhe says in a clear tone.‚Äù The smell of stew hits Whizzerd and feels a ache he hasn‚Äôt felt in forever. Upon entering the house Whizzerd see‚Äôs a human women tending to a stew over a fire. Her striking blond hair spurring a memory inside him. ‚ÄúCora?‚Äù The women turns to him, surprised at first, but a bright smile grows on her face as she starts to recognize the half-orc ‚ÄúHey Matthias, or should I say Whizzerd?‚Äù she says with a playful chuckle. ‚ÄúDoes this mean I‚Äôm dead?‚Äù ‚ÄúNot quite, I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll be back at it soon enough.‚Äù ‚ÄúI failed them Cora,‚Äù Whizzerd says, his voice breaking, ‚ÄúNot just Mira but Helen, Charlie and all those people.‚Äù ‚ÄúMatthias remember what you promised? Cassie BOT 15-12-2023 18:42

Thelgar BOT 15-12-2023 18:43
Thelgar's gloating is short-lived as the remaining orb refracts the nearby light to suddenly blind him. He has a horrifying moment in midair to realize that his elemental spirits have abandoned him as a magical paralysis takes hold. Then, gravity takes over. The dwarf plummets from the sky to impact with a sickening crunch of metal armor, his maul tumbling out of his limp grasp. (edited)
Ellie Lightfall BOT 17-12-2023 00:51
With her armor covered in acid and corroding by the minute, Ellie didn't have a lot of ways out of this mess. Most of her magic was drained already, and from where she was, she only had her warm crimson blood to keep her company. Things were looking grim. Thinking back to the effect of Thelgar's fire on the crystal, Ellie considers its potential while looking over at Whizzerd. He was lying still. She would not allow this. He had to make it out. "We are not done fighting!" "We will cross the divide..." She struck her sword against the ground and flower-shaped lights rippled across towards Whizzerd, bursting into his body with divine magic. Seeing Thelgar go down near her left her with even fewer options, and when she tired mentally reaching into the orb's essence, she missed a psychic strike. Her head was throbbing, and she couldn't get a grip on herself. It was making her less reliable at a crucial moment. (edited)

DM [Esh] BOT 18-12-2023 00:15
Defending against most of the onslaught Rawk continues to taunt Whizzerd, "Dr. Larson, you have become a nothing since you had left us at lease before you were a part of something greater. Swinging around a stick, deformed, no better than the countless catalysts we have performed on.-" The Director grimaces as he takes a blow from the heavy axe as it makes it through Rawk's arcane ward, but in retaliation, with his mastery over the crystals he whispers something. Something sinister. And in response Whizzerd's crystals glow a deep hot red filling his mind with flashes of memories of past patients. Pain, suffering, trauma. Whiz's skin blisters from the crystals heat radiating throughout his entire body bringing him to his knees. His vision fading. Blurs. Matthias's house. The lab. Cora. Dr. Gideon Rawk. Cora's warm smile. Rawk's sinister grin. The aromatic stew. The cold sterility of the lab and copper tang from the blood. The ozone of Thelgar's storm magic. The sound of machinery and cries of pain from Whizzerd's companions and Rawk's experiments both fill the air bringing the half-orc to the present. Exhausted and hurt Whizzerd stands back up. His body wracked with wounds and scars, both old and newly forming, skin seared from Rawk's last strike of vengeance. Despite being at Death's door himself Whizzerd adjusts the grip on his great axe and mightily swings it forward. Unprepared, the blow slices across Gideon's abdomen fatally emboweling the doctor. Rawk looks down and for the first time the doctor's face showed fear and... worry?
DM [Esh] BOT 18-12-2023 00:15

Yes, I admit that we may have skirted around ethics but what the Machine People have gained will all be destroyed if He is unleashed. The world will be destroyed if He is unleashed. Dennoroth." He looks at Whizzerd dead in the eye. "You know the name. You know what he wants. Everything that we have done. Everything that we have strived to do was in an attempt to restrain him. The crystals, the memories.. the patients. Everything. You are - were a man of science. You know that sometimes the greater good of mankind may have some bumps along the way. Please. I implore you. Continue my work. Ensure that He gains no foothold in our world. Plea-" The brightest of intelligence behind Doctor Rawk's eyes seem to fade, the pool of blood and gore flows outward as his body goes limp.

DM [Esh] BOT 19-12-2023 20:59
Whizzerd ruffles the director he finds some notes on Dr. Rawk's person. A few bundled old papers, worn tattered, and now bloodied you can tell that these have been written a long while ago. Something Rawk kept for a long, a very long time. These documents seem to be handwritten notes ripped from a book, a journal perhaps?
We've discovered a trove of priceless treasure but no, this treasure is not the pale shimmer of gold. No, we, me and several of my colleagues - brilliant minded and eager to change the world - have discovered an old series of caves and caverns untouched for aeons. What we have found instead will do just that- change the world! Within those caverns we found ancient technology of another era, of perhaps our ancestors or an entirely different life form than us. We have found countless types of machinery; weapons, day to day comforts, medical apparati. My entire being is shaking from the unlimited and untapped potential! We can do it! I cannot  believe it. My mind is swirling. It's like there are countless voices in my head whispering, yelling, coaxing. They all are saying the same thing! With all of this in here will make the world a utopia! The world will be in our image like a master smith, these tools will construct our very paradise!! This is very unlike me but how often does one stumble into something like this?! My mind is abuzz with elation. These machines will be our savior. We will now be known as the Machine People! I will speak to my colleagues
DM [Esh] BOT 19-12-2023 20:59
Several other notes are written about the successes of Rawk and his colleagues but you find another page written with crucial information;
It seems that we were not alone that day. Those voices and thoughts. Those were not mine. They were not mere whimsical thoughts of passion. And they were not mine alone! My colleagues heard them in their own minds as well - which we haven't discovered until much later. No. These were the words of the malevolent Dennoroth implanted into our minds. We eventually realized that each of us had discovered this on our own and that none of us were daunted by this. Not in the slightest! This vicious fiend has promised us an unlimited fountain of knowledge and MORE! All in exchange for our souls. Ha! What do we need a soul for when we can achieve anything!Instead we welcomed it! With open arms! We will do anything in our pursuit of knowledge.. and to forge our path of power. What we have accomplished is worth more than anything. Any kingdom's treasury. Any soul! It matters not! We will most definitely not be stopped by this foul entity! We will redirect our efforts- for the time being at least - to recapturing Dennoroth and send him back to the pits whence he came!
DM [Esh] BOT 19-12-2023 21:00
Going through some archived papers Cassie and Ellie find something too:
**Doctor&#x27;s Log - Week 1** I am proud to say that we have enjoyed countless years and an untold amount of success in our work but things are changing. Dennoroth's whispering has become more profound in all of us. It is halting our work and our progress. We all hear it. We hear his words; He will claim all of our work, all of our achievements, we will have nothing. He swears that upon his liberation his ancient force will be unmatched, that he is a being of unimaginable power. This poses an imminent threat not just to the Machine People and our work but to the entirety of existence and of our world. The crystals that we've discovered along with the technology, steeped in wild and chaotic magic, possess an inherent ability to bind and confine those forces. When artfully synchronized with a suitable host, these crystalline prisons exhibit the promise of securing our realm from the persistent threat of the fiend. The implications of this discovery are profound and may be our salvation. If we fail to confine Dennoroth this will result in a catastrophic release that will unleash chaos upon our existence. It is crucial to understand that we must refocus all of our past work and recognize the urgent necessity of imprisoning Dennoroth once more. Not solely for the continuation of our enigmatic work but as an imperative measure to avert the impending cataclysm that Dennoroth's unbridled malevolence could unleash upon us. *Dr. GR*

DM [Esh] BOT 20-12-2023 16:46

Whizzerd strides over to the portal of the crystal cave and lifts up a hand towards it. Slowly, deliberately he presses his palm against the portal. Eyes closed as if savoring an extraordinary moment Whizzerd breathes deeply. On the exhale the crystals on Whizzerd's body brightly glow. Through the portal the crystals aligning the wall and ceiling mimic the glow. Then as if siphoning off of Whizzerd his crystals start to dim and the ones in the portal glow brighter, going further down the cavern corridor. Eventually Whizzerd's crystals become nothing but dull fragments as the energy transfers down the path as if the light is racing through those depths, the crystal lights dimming as the source travels deeper and deeper into the depths.

Cassie BOT 20-12-2023 19:32

Ellie Lightfall BOT 20-12-2023 19:52
Recognizing "caffeine", Ellie feels confident in her conclusion and blurts it out. "Hmm, we had coffee where I was from. A brown, hot drink made from exotic beans. Caffeine was some substance that was part of it, and it always made me sleepy after having some. So these probably also make you tired. People always looked dead tired after having it in liquid form, yet many swore they actually felt more alert. Some were also really addicted and had way too much in a day. I never understood it, but then again, the doctor seemed pretty enraptured by his research, crazed even, so I could see him using these for some reason. Maybe he thought he could put the demon to sleep somehow."
Thelgar BOT 20-12-2023 20:43
‚ÄúHells, a nap sounds good right about now!‚Äù Thelgar explains, popping out the cork. ‚ÄúBesides, if anyone‚Äôs gonna try it out it‚Äôs me - we dwarves are made‚Äôa stronger stuff than most!‚Äù He pats the armor over his stomach for emphasis, then quickly swallows a pill.
DM [Esh] BOT 20-12-2023 20:50
The pill shoots past his mouth, down the dwarf's gullet and bounces around his stomach. The storm sorcery may channel lightning but he has never felt this supercharged before. After the initial rush Thelgar feels fully revitalized, as if he slept a full eight hours. And then some.
Thelgar BOT 20-12-2023 21:12
‚ÄúwaaaAAAHOOO!!! Oh, tha‚Äôs the stuff! Awright, who‚Äôs ready ta go WRESTLE A DEMON!?!?‚Äù Thelgar bolts upright and leaps nearly a foot in the air, his eyes open as wide as they can go and the hair of his beard bristling with static. ‚ÄúYa gotta try this - it‚Äôs tha GOOD stuff!!!‚Äù

DM [Esh] BOT 22-12-2023 01:30

The sounds of humanoid emotions and experiences, wherever they came from, drowned out the eldritch and refocused her mind onto what truly mattered to her, something these whispers and demons could never offer. "Are you two feeling affected at all?" (edited)

DM [Esh] BOT 25-12-2023 16:39
The gang is all here it seems This voice is more than a mere whisper, this one is louder, its echoes bouncing against every surface of the cavern, amplified against every fractal formation. A chill of malice sweeps through the cave, each crystal facet twinkling as the shadow of a sinister face appears, twisted in barely constrained anger. It is so good to have you all. Please excuse the mess though I do plan on a mass renovation soon. Truly the largest COLLECTION OF IDIOTS that I've ever dealt with and so I must thank you for that. That moronic doctor couldn't tie his own shows WITHOUT MY HELP yet he thought he could stop me? HE WAS BARELY AN INCONVENIENCE!!! I WILL SQUASH YOU LIKE A BUG! The curtains are ready to close and the world has only to thank you. As the voice continues to talk, the crystal formations around the party had been growing at an accelerated rate. These crystals though seem to be growing in deliberate shapes: a few rough humanoids with bladed limbs take form, a draconic-like quadraped elongates, a couple other forms take shape. Each starting to animate, cracking itself apart from its structure. The largest formation - where Whizzerd and Thelgar stand starts to solidify, forming into a giant of a brute. The refracted laughing faces fade from each crystal around the cave becoming less transparent within the central crystal as Dennoroth's form starts to take shape. Near Whizzerd, Dennoroth's weapon, a giant sword entirely made from crystal starts forming upward, hilt first... At a perfect angle to be grabbed...

Cassie manages to pour her last healing potion down Ellie's throat as she carries her, limping as she goes.
Whizzerd BOT 31-12-2023 02:50
‚ÄúYeah, it‚Äôs over,‚Äù Whizzerd says reassuringly, ‚ÄúDennorotha gone for the time being.‚Äù As they made it outside the complex Whizzerd felt a huge amount of relief, but also a twinge of worry. While he was happy that the crystals seemed to stop growing over Whizzerd‚Äôs body, at the same time those crystals and the magic it contained allowed for Whizzerd to survive this long in Barovia, it was a magic that protected his friends. Whizzerd wouldn‚Äôt say it out loud but Whizzerd kind of missed the power he once had. ‚ÄúWhizzerd‚Ä¶‚Äù he pauses, ‚ÄúI want to give my thanks. I‚Äôm sure you all have things to attend to but the next time I see you I‚Äôll buy you all a drink.‚Äù (edited)
Cassie BOT 31-12-2023 02:55
Cassie sets Ellie down and gives a weak laugh. "A drink sounds good right about n--" She suddenly collapses and it's clear that her wound is still bleeding freely.
Ellie Lightfall BOT 31-12-2023 02:56
Ellie comes to as they make the careful trek out of the caverns and labs. "One, two, three, four... We got him?" She gives Cassie a bit of a squeeze so she can readjust herself and help carry her own weight. "Thank you, Cassie." "Man, i'm going to need some time to gear up again. It'd be nice to have a drink you all when the time comes. There's some things I need to figure out on my own." She quickly grabs onto Cassie when she collapses and helps her up again. "Almost there."
Whizzerd BOT 31-12-2023 03:15
Whizzerd takes a second to look at Cassie‚Äôs wound. ‚ÄúAlright, it seems like I don‚Äôt remember how to doctor good. Ellie you probably would do a better job.‚Äù
1
DM [Esh] BOT 31-12-2023 03:21
As everyone seems to be standing upright recovering from the battle Cassie then collapses on the floor. Moaning in pain from the shrapnel wound Cassie keels over in pain. Face pale from the pain Cassie looks up to the others but only thinks of Nasami... Nasami.... Whizzerd and Ellie look over Cassie's wound and see nothing. It seems the shrapnel shards have dissolved along with the other crystals upon Dennoroth's demise. Her wound barely there....
Ellie Lightfall BOT 31-12-2023 03:25
She takes a good look at the wound and winces a little. "Oh... yeah that's not good. Ibalik!" A lotus of light blooms momentarily from the site, its light ensuring the wound stays closed until they can have a proper rest back in town. "Well, that's probably good enough for now."
Cassie BOT 31-12-2023 03:27
The burst of healing is all Cassie needs to return to consciousness. She's pushed through worse than this before. "I'm fine. I'm fine," she insists. "Let's just keep moving and get home."
Ellie Lightfall BOT 31-12-2023 03:35
"It shouldn't be too far. The path we took should still be here and when we get there we can follow it back out."
Thelgar BOT 31-12-2023 04:00
Lurching along with the others, Thelgar suddenly bolts upright - well, as much as his mangled body can manage, anyway - and looks backwards the way they came with a panicked look on his face. "Wait! We've got ta go back! The treasures! The riches! The women! They were somewhere back in that cave! I heard 'em callin ta me plain as day! That damn demon was hoardin em for himself!" Evidently the blood loss has made him at least partly delirious, and he half-turns as if to go back into the compound.
4
2
Whizzerd BOT 31-12-2023 16:32
Whizzerd picks up Thelgar to stop him from going. ‚ÄúOh no! Is Dennoroth still controlling him?‚Äù
Cassie BOT 31-12-2023 18:18
"Nah. Just give him a minute. Or maybe a light smack upside his head."
Ellie Lightfall BOT 31-12-2023 22:09
"He's delirious and half-dead. A good smack might knock him out cold." She's struggling to stifle her laughter. I mean, seeing Thelgar in this state was hilarious despite her real concern. (edited)
DM [Esh] BOT 01-01-2024 14:16
Each of the companions stand in differing stages of injury and recovery but alive. Thankfully each are alive. Now that the threat of Dennoroth has ended, the surrounding crystals void of their sinister powers, the group travels back towards the 'entrance' or the portal leading to Rawk's lab and stand before it, ready to jump through it as the cavern starts to collapse from behind them. Arriving on the other side reveals a shock to each of them. Though stepping through the portal brought them back to the laboratory it was not the one that they had left. This time Dr. Rawk's lab wasn't just abandoned, this time it was a hollow, decrepit shell. This time, machinery had fully decayed, becoming unusable, furniture, fixtures and even the walls of the facility are broken down, large segments collapsed and missing. Making it out of the facility, the group sees more of the same. Rapid degradation of everything they pass. Eventually making it out of the facility entirely back to the ghost town under the gloomy sky but the town too is showing mass decay and degradation. The town is falling apart into nothingness before their very eyes.
Cassie BOT 01-01-2024 14:32
"And good riddance, I say," Cassie says, oblivious to whether Whizzerd may feel differently about his past disintegrating.
Thelgar BOT 01-01-2024 15:18
‚ÄúBarovia got em - poor bastards.‚Äù Thelgar shakes his head, wincing at the pain it sends down his neck. ‚ÄúWell, at least they ain‚Äôt around to hurt anybody else.‚Äù
Whizzerd BOT 01-01-2024 16:08
Whizzerd looks as the lab and the town surrounding it dissolve into Barovia. A mix of relief and concern washing over his face. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just glad that I remembered more of my past,‚Äù he said as he turned towards the otters, ‚ÄúOnce again I have to thank you. Couldn‚Äôt have done it without all of you.‚Äù Whizzerd flashes a smile to the rest of the group, ‚ÄúNow let‚Äôs get back to the bar. I want a drink after all of that!‚Äù
Ellie Lightfall BOT 01-01-2024 19:12
She watches with the group as the town disappears before their eyes. Despite their victory, she can't help but feel like there's something more she's not understanding. Faint voices and faded memories, and a vague sense of forgetting something. "Yeah.. A drink would be great right now." "And a good night's rest after wouldn't hurt either." Hm, so she's still hearing things. Perhaps... perhaps the voice was right though.
Cassie BOT 01-01-2024 22:18
For a moment, Cassie considers looking around for any loot -- but does she really want to take anything from this accursed place? She could, occasionally, let a good deed be its own reward.
DM [Esh] BOT 02-01-2024 04:01
The party makes their way out to the ghost town's outskirts, leaving a town that is leaving this existence with every step they take. With the buildings fading and the once towering facility, leaving an ominous shadow over the town, now nothing but a toppled monolith degrading by the second. Whizzerd looks behind him at the settlement of his past. Whatever life Dr. Matthias Larson may have had it is now crumbling before Whizzerd's very eyes. He turns back to the rest of his companions to head back home and as he does he swears he hears a whisper on the wind.. You haven't won... I will kill you.... Whipping back Whizzerd sees no one. Hears nothing else. The companions looks at him unsure of what happened. Whizzard turns back. Perhaps it was just the wind. It has been an eventful few days. A lot to take in. A lot to deal with.
Whizzerd BOT 02-01-2024 04:52
As Whizzerd looks back he notices a glint in the wreckage as he hears the voice. ‚ÄúYou guys go ahead! I‚Äôll catch up!‚Äù Approaching the glint he see‚Äôs the crystal Greatsword half-buried in the wreck. A challenge perhaps? Gingerly Whizzerd picks up the Greatsword and places it on his back. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll be ready for you next time.‚Äù *he says to no one in particular before running to catch up with the others.‚Äù
2
Cassie BOT 02-01-2024 05:26
Cassie is too battle weary to pay much attention to Whizzerd's sudden departure and return, let alone his new acquisition. "I think I might take a break from adventuring for a little while," she says after a few more minutes walking. "Waitressing is certainly sounding a lot more appealing."
Ellie Lightfall BOT 02-01-2024 08:49
‚ÄúI‚Äôd like to pass out on a decent bed. My head‚Äôs been buzzing since we got in there. All the crystals and their memories are still whirling around in there, probably because of my mom‚Äôs side of the family‚Ä¶‚Äù She barely notices as Whizzerd leaves and returns, as she makes conversation with the others on the way back.
DM [Esh] BOT 02-01-2024 22:23
Traveling through the Mists the companions leave the outskirts of the town. Looking back though, they see nothing left. As if it was nothing but a faded memory. If it wasn't for the glisten of Whizzerd's crystal greatsword one may think it was just that. Despite the fog of Barovia laying thick and despite their weariness the companions have been able to navigate back to civilization, spending ample time on their recovery after a physically and mentally exhausting excursion.
